snippet: Tuesday was an eclectic day for polling news, but one data point had the largest influence on our forecast: the latest edition of The Wall Street Journal's economic forecasting survey.
abstract: Tuesday was an eclectic day for polling news, but one data point had the largest influence on our forecast: the latest edition of The Wall Street Journal's economic forecasting survey.

headline.main: July 17: Obama's Re-election Chances Fall on Gloomy G.D.P. Forecast
